statements: SELECT * FROM images_and_reports;
SELECT image_id, image_url, diagnosis FROM images_and_reports WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT report, diagnosis FROM images_and_reports WHERE diagnosis = 'Normal' ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, image_url FROM images_and_reports WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_images FROM images_and_reports WHERE patient_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM images_and_reports WHERE patient_id = 101 ORDER BY upload_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_id, image_url, report FROM images_and_reports WHERE diagnosis = 'Pneumonia';
SELECT diagnosis, COUNT(*) AS count FROM images_and_reports GROUP BY diagnosis HAVING count > 2;
SELECT * FROM images_and_reports WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND patient_id = 102;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(upload_date) AS latest_upload FROM images_and_reports GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01' AND date_of_birth <= '1995-12-31'
SELECT record_type, record_date FROM medical_records WHERE record_date >= '2020-01-01' ORDER BY record_date ASC
SELECT patient_name, record_type, notes FROM patients p JOIN medical_records mr ON p.patient_id = mr.patient_id WHERE record_type = 'Diagnosis'
SELECT * FROM patients
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC
SELECT patients.patient_name, medical_records.record_type FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE medical_records.record_type = 'Surgery'
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS record_count FROM medical_records GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M'
SELECT * FROM Patient_Images WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT image_url FROM Patient_Images WHERE privacy_level = 'High' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT report_text, report_date FROM Diagnostic_Reports WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Consultation_Logs WHERE patient_id = 3 ORDER BY consultation_date ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, report_text FROM Diagnostic_Reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patient_Images WHERE patient_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT image_url FROM Patient_Images WHERE privacy_level = 'high' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT report_text, report_date FROM Diagnostic_Reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name FROM Diagnostic_Reports WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT patient_id, consultation_date FROM Consultation_Logs WHERE consultation_duration > 30 ORDER BY consultation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, diagnostic_report FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM virtual_consultations WHERE consultation_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, image_description FROM patients JOIN images ON patients.patient_id = images.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, diagnostic_report FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, location FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients p JOIN virtual_consultations v ON p.patient_id = v.patient_id;
SELECT image_id, image_description FROM images WHERE image_description LIKE '%X-Ray%';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patient
SELECT condition_name, condition_description FROM HealthCondition
SELECT image_name, image_data FROM Image
SELECT report_date, report_details FROM DiagnosticReport
SELECT consultation_date, consultation_details FROM Consultation
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patient WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Image WHERE image_id = 123;
SELECT patient_name, condition_name FROM Patient JOIN HealthCondition ON Patient.patient_id = HealthCondition.patient_id WHERE Patient.patient_age < 40;
SELECT report_date, report_details FROM DiagnosticReport ORDER BY report_date DESC;
